step.cmd: In the upper right-hand corner of the web page, click Signup.
Follow the instructions to create an account.
step.info: You will need to provide your e-mail address, select a password and user ID, select whether you want to receive product information, and perform a test in order to validate your account.

step.stepresult: GitHub e-mails you a launch code.

step.cmd: Enter the launch code on the browser page.

info.note: If you have difficulties pasting the launch code into the browser page, ensure that you have copied a text version of the launch code.
